snippet: As President Obama tries to rally domestic support for military action against Syria, the skepticism in Waynesburg, Pa.,  underscores the political hurdles he faces.
abstract: Skepticism among residents of Waynesburg, Pa, over possible military action against Syria underscores political hurdles Pres Obama faces as he tries to rally domestic support for attack; bucolic, if fading, town is proudly patriotic, but many see Middle East as quicksand to be avoided and say that domestic needs override foreign imperatives.
lead_paragraph: As President Obama tries to rally domestic support for military action against Syria, the skepticism in Waynesburg, Pa.,  underscores the political hurdles he faces.

headline.main: Skepticism and Wariness in Talk of Syria Attack
headline.print_headline: Proudly Patriotic but Skeptical on Syria Attack
